title: Emerald Bloom Jhumkas - A Timeless Treasure
materials: embellished with meticulously placed CZ stones and a central Emerald. Real Freshwater Pearls adorn the base. Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: Classic Jhumka design with intricate filigree work. The floral top encases a vibrant emerald, surrounded by sparkling CZ stones. Pearl droplets add a touch of elegance and movement. The jhumka bell features traditional South Indian patterns.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal for a bride's muhurtham or a grand reception. Can also add a touch of traditional glamour to modern outfits.
description: These Jhumkas are a perfect blend of tradition and elegance. The vibrant emerald and sparkling CZ stones add a touch of luxury, while the classic design ensures timeless appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and a lasting shine. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, signifying heritage and sophistication.
